    This class defines the operator manager used for parsing agent identifiers.

    Represents an internal operation of a ReSpecT virtual machine.

    Defines the reaction type managed by ReSpect Reactor (logic reactions).

    OrdinaryAsynchInterface  
    OrdinarySynchInterface
    A Blocking Context wraps the access to a tuple centre virtual machine for a specific thread of control, providing a blocking interface.

    Pending Query Set.
    ResourceManager
    Class used for managing probes.

    RespectVMContext

    SerialComm
    Class used for serial communication.
    SpecificationAsynchInterface  
    SpecificationSynchInterface
    A Blocking Context wraps the access to a tuple centre virtual machine for a specific thread of control, providing a blocking interface.

    A Timed Context wraps the access to a tuple centre virtual machine for a specific thread of control, providing a timed interface.
    TransducerManager
    Class used for managing transducers.
    TRSet
    Triggered Reaction Set.

    This class defines the operator manager used for parsing tuple centre identifiers.
